title: 4.16 stuck at 32% constantly
body:
I own a mac, v10.8.3, never had an issue updating a patch before 4.16. I've tried every solution I could find, yet the update continues to stop downloading the moment it hits 32%. It also gives me a pop-up warning at the beginning of the patch that says that an "unspecified error" has occurred and that I should "check the logs".

Been a while since 4.16 came out, I fully expect a solution for this.

replies.body:
Hello again!

The first fix we pushed out wasn't successful but we pushed out another!

Delete your lol_air_client project folder located at: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\
and patch up again.

As a heads up, this will delete your custom item sets if you have any so I would suggest to back them up before deleting the air client folder. Here is how: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21743560-Getting-Started-with-Item-Sets-#backing


Let me know if you were able to patch. Thank you ^^~
This does fix my ability to actually begin downloading the patch without any warnings, but the moment it hits 32%, it halts the download indefinitely, so I am still unable to update the patch.
Continues to fail, even after clearing all files and attempting to reinstall.  Also using win 8.

> Continues to fail, even after clearing all files and attempting to reinstall.  Also using win 8.

Same here! It's a widespread issue for sure guys, but not everyone
this has also been happening to me, but I am using windows 8. I have re-downloaded league and reset my internet but it does not work

Hey everyone, 

We are actively investigating this issue and have pushed out a potential fix for it. Please try to patch up again and let me know if you were able to patch up or not.  If you're still getting stuck at 32%, please send us your logs by going into the patcher and selecting Save Logs through the options menu (gear icon on the top right). You can add them as an attachment here or upload them to a fileshare application of your choice (dropbox, google drive, etc).

This seems to be working so far, it at least has got it past the same hump I've been getting.  It will take a while for the rest to download but will post it here in for people to try.  Good luck.

Thanks to LeBurrithor for sharing.

1) go to Riot games/RADS/projects/lol_patcher/realeses/0.0.0.5
2) copy the S_OK file
3) go to Riot Games/RADS/project/lol_air_client/releases/0.0.1.107
4) paste S_OK file
5) try to run your client

Edit:  worked!
can't connect at all and when i click on help and support after the failure about unable to connect the webpage say someone might be pirating my account please investigate that I'm very scare by this

Hey there

If you're worried about the security of your account, click your summoner name at the top of the page to change your password and email address.

Hey there

If you're getting an unspecified error message, chances are there's a problem with your installation. I suggest starting fresh with a new install of League. Be sure to [follow these instructions](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/29521940-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) when reinstalling, and allow the patcher a good amount of time to update the game before giving up on it.
Having the same problem at 33% , I downloaded hotspot and used that, now it's at 35% but is updated EXTREMELY slow. ugh.
